p: Archived plasma/serum samples from the KBC study which had been stored at -80Â°C were retrieved and screened using 3 serological assay techniques: (i) a PRNT (ii) an IgG ELISA assay using crude RSV lysate as antigen (crude ELISA) and (iii) an RSV IgG ELISA using a commercial ELISA kit (IBL ELISA).
